text: Ramón Darío Larrosa De los Santos (born 13 December 1971 in Montevideo) is a Uruguayan footballer who played for Racing Club de Montevideo. ==References== Category:1971 births Category:Living people Category:Sportspeople from Montevideo Category:Uruguayan footballers Category:Racing Club de Montevideo players Category:C.S.D. title: Darío Larrosa
